sentences.en: Brian: I hate Jingle Bells! I prefer The Little Drummer Boy song.
sentences.cn: 布莱恩: 我讨厌《铃儿响叮当》! 我更喜欢那首《打鼓的小男孩》.
他把汽车钥匙弄得叮当响。

sentences.en: He made kitchen utensils and appliances jingle in the kitchen.
sentences.cn: 他在厨房把厨具弄得丁零当啷地响.

sentences.en: In the street below could be heard the jingle of street - cars.
sentences.cn: 下面大街上可以听见电车叮叮当当的声音.

sentences.en: Jingle Bells and Silent Night are popular Christmas carols.
sentences.cn: “圣诞铃声”和“平安夜”都是广受欢迎的圣诞颂歌.

sentences.en: Michael: Jingle Bells , Jingle Bells , Jingle All the Way.
sentences.cn: 迈克尔: 叮叮当, 叮叮当, 铃儿响叮当.

sentences.en: Summary : Director Mr Jingle Ma defaults this kind of speculation.
sentences.cn: 导演马楚成也默认过这种炒作的行为.

sentences.en: the jingle of coins in his pocket
The key fell on the ground with a jingle.
The knives and forks set up their regular jingle.
sentences.cn: 刀叉发出常有的叮当声.

sentences.en: The sleigh bells jingle as we ride.
sentences.cn: 我们乘雪橇行进时,雪橇铃叮当作响.

sentences.en: The third is the " jingle bell ring children. "
sentences.cn: 第三个是《铃铛儿响叮当 》.

sentences.en: They landed with a merry jingle when the jar was almost empty.
sentences.cn: 当罐子几乎还是空着的时候,它们落进去时发出的是快乐的叮当声.

sentences.en: What a captivating jingle it is!
With jingle bells and workshop elves and time to ho , ho, ho.
sentences.cn: 带着雪橇铃 、 作坊小精灵和美好时光, 来吧!哈哈!

words.tran_cn: 发出叮当声；押韵（jingle的ing形式）

trans.tran_cn: 叮当声，节拍十分规则的简单诗歌
trans.tran_en: a short song used in advertisements
to shake small metal things together so that they make a sound, or to make this sound

trans.tran_cn: （使）叮当作响，具有简单而又引人注意的韵律
